text: Poor Butterfly () is a 1986 Argentine drama movie directed by Raúl de la Torre and starring Graciela Borges, Lautaro Murúa, Pepe Soriano, Víctor Laplace, Bibi Andersson, Duilio Marzio, Cipe Lincovsky. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 drama movies Category:Argentine drama movies
title: Poor Butterfly
